original_text: On the sixth day, the Israelites picked up twice as much food. They picked up four litres for each person. Then the leaders of the people told Moses what they had done.
korean_text: 여섯째 날에는 각 사람이 갑절의 식물 곧 하나에 두 오멜씩 거둔지라 회중의 모든 지도자가 와서 모세에게 알리매

sentences.original_text: the Israelites picked up twice as much food.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 두 배의 음식을 거두었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They picked up four litres for each person.
Then the leaders of the people
told Moses what they had done.
